notepad.metaTitle: Free Online Notepad - Auto-Save & Dark Mode | Online Tools
notepad.metaDescription: Free online notepad with auto-save feature, dark mode, find & replace, and word count. Your notes are stored locally in browser. 100% private and secure.
notepad.alert: This notepad uses localStorage to save your notes. Your data is stored locally in your browser.

helpMenu.shortcutsText:
Keyboard shortcuts:
Ctrl+S - Save
Ctrl+Z - Undo
Ctrl+Y - Redo
Ctrl+A - Select All
Ctrl+P - Print

messages.confirmNew: Current text will be lost. Continue?

privateSecure.title: 100% Private & Secure
privateSecure.description: Your notes are stored locally in your browser. Nothing is uploaded to any server, ensuring complete privacy and security.

autoSave.title: Auto-Save Feature
autoSave.description: Never lose your work! All changes are automatically saved to your browser's local storage in real-time.

darkMode.title: Dark Mode Support
darkMode.description: Switch between light and dark themes for comfortable writing in any lighting condition. Your preference is saved.

richText.title: Rich Text Editing
richText.description: Full editing capabilities with undo/redo, find & replace, word count, and customizable font size for optimal writing experience.

fileOps.title: Easy File Operations
fileOps.description: Open, save, and download text files. Export your notes as TXT files or share via email with just one click.

free.title: 100% Free Forever
free.description: No premium features, no subscriptions, no hidden costs. All features are completely free with unlimited usage.

privateSecure.title: 100% Private & Secure
privateSecure.description: All processing happens locally in your browser. Your files and data never leave your device and are not uploaded to any server.

completelyFree.title: Completely Free
completelyFree.description: No hidden costs, no subscriptions, no premium features. All tools are 100% free with unlimited usage forever.

fastEasy.title: Fast & Easy
fastEasy.description: No installation or registration required. Just open your browser and start using our tools instantly.

noDataCollection.title: No Data Collection
noDataCollection.description: We don't track, store, or collect any of your data. Complete privacy protection guaranteed.

worksEverywhere.title: Works Everywhere
worksEverywhere.description: Fully responsive design works on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. Use our tools anywhere, anytime.

noLimits.title: No Limits
noLimits.description: Process unlimited files with no restrictions on file size or number of conversions. Use as much as you need.
